code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";let getTime=note=>{return new Date(note.updated).toLocaleDateString();};let getTitle=note=>{let title=note.body.split('\n')[0];if(title.length>45){title=title.slice(0,45)+'...';}return title;};let getContent=note=>{let title=getTitle(note);let content=note.body.replaceAll('\n',' ');content=content.replaceAll(title,'');if(content.length>45){content=content.slice(0,45)+'...';}return content;};const listItem=_ref=>{let{note}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:'/notes/'+note.id,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"notes-list-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:[" ",getTitle(note)," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[" ",getTime(note)," "]}),getContent(note)]})]})});};export default listItem;
